languages.text: {n}На лице Маражая — трудночитаемая маска из эмоций. Бешенство, изумление, озарение — все это смешано воедино. Друкари начинает говорить — неожиданно хрипло и тихо, явно только для ушей Назракея.{/n} "Ты... не собирался свергать Иремерисс. Ты не планировал ставить меня новым архонтом Опустошительной бури. С самого начала... ты просто хотел уничтожить мой кабал".

{n}Marazhai's face is a complex mask of emotions — rage, astonishment and realisation. He begins to speak, his voice unusually hoarse and quiet, the words meant only for Nazrakhei's ears.{/n} "You... were not planning to overthrow Yremeryss. You did not plan to make me the new Archon of the Reaving Tempest. From the beginning... you only wanted to destroy my Kabal."
languages.original_text: {n}На лице Маражая — трудночитаемая маска из эмоций. Бешенство, изумление, озарение — все это смешано воедино. Друкари начинает говорить — неожиданно хрипло и тихо, явно только для ушей Назракея.{/n} "Ты... не собирался свергать Иремерисс. Ты не планировал ставить меня новым архонтом Опустошительной бури. С самого начала... ты просто хотел уничтожить мой кабал".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's face is an incredible mask of rage, astonishment and epiphany. He begins to speak, his voice unusually hoarse and quiet, the words meant only for Nazrakhei's ears.{/n} "You... were not planning to overthrow Yremeryss down. You did not plan to make me the new Archon of the Reaving Tempest. From the beginning... you only wanted to destroy my Kabal."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Gesicht ist eine komplexe Maske der Emotionen — Zorn, Erstaunen und Erkenntnis. Er beginnt zu sprechen. Seine Stimme ist ungewöhnlich heiser und leise, die Worte sind nur für Nazrakheis Ohren bestimmt.{/n} "Ihr ... hattet nicht vor, Yremeryss zu stürzen. Ihr hattet nicht vor, mich zum neuen Archonten des plündernden Sturms zu machen. Von Anfang an ... wolltet Ihr nur die Kabale zerstören."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face is a complex mask of emotions — rage, astonishment and realisation. He begins to speak, his voice unusually hoarse and quiet, the words meant only for Nazrakhei's ears.{/n} "You... were not planning to overthrow Yremeryss. You did not plan to make me the new Archon of the Reaving Tempest. From the beginning... you only wanted to destroy my Kabal."

Seine Stimme ist ungewöhnlich heiser und leise, die Worte sind nur für Nazrakheis Ohren bestimmt.{/n} "Ihr ... hattet nicht vor, Yremeryss zu stürzen. Ihr hattet nicht vor, mich zum neuen Archonten des plündernden Sturms zu machen. Von Anfang an ... wolltet Ihr nur die Kabale zerstören."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋脸上流露了复杂的情绪：愤怒、惊讶、恍然大悟。当他开口时，他的声音异常嘶哑、平静。很显然，这些话只是对纳札骸说的。{/n}“你……你根本没打算推翻伊芮梅莉斯，也没打算让我成为狂风阴谋团的新任执政官。你从一开始……就打算摧毁我的阴谋团。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face is a complex mask of emotions — rage, astonishment and realisation. He begins to speak, his voice unusually hoarse and quiet, the words meant only for Nazrakhei's ears.{/n} "You... were not planning to overthrow Yremeryss. You did not plan to make me the new Archon of the Reaving Tempest. From the beginning... you only wanted to destroy my Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋脸上流露了复杂的情绪：愤怒、惊讶、恍然大悟。当他开口时，他的声音异常嘶哑、平静。很显然，这些话只是对纳札骸说的。{/n}“你……你根本没打算推翻伊芮梅莉斯，也没打算让我成为狂风阴谋团的新任执政官。你从一开始……就打算摧毁我的阴谋团。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Marazhai est une mosaïque complexe d'émotions mêlant compréhension, stupéfaction et fureur. Il se met à parler, la voix bien plus rauque et calme qu'à son habitude, ses mots destinés à Nazrakhei seulement.{/n} « Vous... n'aviez pas l'intention de renverser Yremeryss. Vous n'aviez pas prévu de faire de moi le nouvel archonte de la Tempête ravageuse. Depuis le début... ce qui vous animait, c'était la destruction de ma Kabale. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face is a complex mask of emotions — rage, astonishment and realisation. He begins to speak, his voice unusually hoarse and quiet, the words meant only for Nazrakhei's ears.{/n} "You... were not planning to overthrow Yremeryss. You did not plan to make me the new Archon of the Reaving Tempest. From the beginning... you only wanted to destroy my Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Marazhai est une mosaïque complexe d'émotions mêlant compréhension, stupéfaction et fureur. Il se met à parler, la voix bien plus rauque et calme qu'à son habitude, ses mots destinés à Nazrakhei seulement.{/n} « Vous... n'aviez pas l'intention de renverser Yremeryss. Vous n'aviez pas prévu de faire de moi le nouvel archonte de la Tempête ravageuse. Depuis le début... ce qui vous animait, c'était la destruction de ma Kabale.
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}La cara de Marazhai es un cuadro, combinando furia, asombro y revelación. Empieza a hablar con voz ronca y callada, dirigiendo sus palabras solo a Nazrakhei.{/n} «No... no pretendías derrocar a Yremeryss. No querías nombrarme el nuevo Arconte de la Tempestad Asoladora. Desde el principio... tu única intención era destruir mi Kábala».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face is a complex mask of emotions — rage, astonishment and realisation. He begins to speak, his voice unusually hoarse and quiet, the words meant only for Nazrakhei's ears.{/n} "You... were not planning to overthrow Yremeryss. You did not plan to make me the new Archon of the Reaving Tempest. From the beginning... you only wanted to destroy my Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}La cara de Marazhai es un cuadro, combinando furia, asombro y revelación. Empieza a hablar con voz ronca y callada, dirigiendo sus palabras solo a Nazrakhei.{/n} «No... no pretendías derrocar a Yremeryss. No querías nombrarme el nuevo Arconte de la Tempestad Asoladora. Desde el principio... tu única intención era destruir mi Kábala».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの表情には様々な感情が入り混じっている…怒り、驚愕、そして悟り。いつになくかすれた静かな声で話し始めるが、その言葉はナズラクヘイにのみ向けて発せられていた。{/n}「お前は…イレメリスを倒そうとしたわけではない。俺を略奪の嵐の新たなアーコンにしようとした訳でもない。初めから…ただ俺の陰謀団を潰したかっただけなんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face is a complex mask of emotions — rage, astonishment and realisation. He begins to speak, his voice unusually hoarse and quiet, the words meant only for Nazrakhei's ears.{/n} "You... were not planning to overthrow Yremeryss. You did not plan to make me the new Archon of the Reaving Tempest. From the beginning... you only wanted to destroy my Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの表情には様々な感情が入り混じっている…怒り、驚愕、そして悟り。いつになくかすれた静かな声で話し始めるが、その言葉はナズラクヘイにのみ向けて発せられていた。{/n}「お前は…イレメリスを倒そうとしたわけではない。俺を略奪の嵐の新たなアーコンにしようとした訳でもない。初めから…ただ俺の陰謀団を潰したかっただけなんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzünde; öfke, hayret ve farkındalık hâllerini bir araya getiren bir duygu mozaiği beliriyor. Alışılmadık derecede boğuk ve kısık bir sesle, Nazrakhei'e hitaben konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Planın Yremeryss'i indirmek değildi. Planın beni, yeni Müfteris Kasırga Arkonu yapmak değildi. En başından beri... Tek istediğin Kabalımı ortadan kaldırmaktı."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face is a complex mask of emotions — rage, astonishment and realisation. He begins to speak, his voice unusually hoarse and quiet, the words meant only for Nazrakhei's ears.{/n} "You... were not planning to overthrow Yremeryss. You did not plan to make me the new Archon of the Reaving Tempest. From the beginning... you only wanted to destroy my Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzünde birçok duygudan oluşan kompleks bir maske var: Öfke, hayret ve farkındalık. Alışılmadık derecede boğuk ve kısık bir sesle, yalnızca Nazrakhei'e hitaben konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Planın Yremeryss'i indirmek değildi. Planın beni Müfteris Kasırga'nın yeni Arkon'u yapmak değildi. En başından beri... Tek istediğin Kabalımı yok etmekti."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
